sectiondef.header: Marco definitions for data cache control

detaileddescription.para: the locked data cache can be flushed
the locked data cache cannot be flushed

briefdescription.para: Check whether instruction cache is available,.
Check whether data cache is available, 0 for not available, >0 for available.
Flush the specific data cache line.
Lock the specific data cache line.

simplesect.para: 0, succeeded, -1, failed (cache already locked or other reasons)

briefdescription.para: Flush data cache lines to memory.
